items.sentence: Tom got stuck doing something that he didn't want to do.
Our receipts for the month will just pay these expenses.
My daughter's getting all gussied up for her first date.
Your father went through all that trouble for your sake.
My opinion on what should be done is different from his.
It won't be that difficult to set up a meeting with Tom.
Is it possible to walk on crutches with two broken legs?
Tom has been spending more and more time away from home.
My life would be so different now if I hadn't done that.
Tom overheard Mary telling John about what had happened.
